EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference - {{lead.Question 1:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference at the following location and the date:
{{lead.Question 1:default=edit me}}
Please contact HoneywellOperatorsConferences@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:HoneywellOperatorsConferences@Honeywell.com]]> for additional inquiries.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
